feature.label: QualinkaPlugin
feature.description: = Plugin Qualinka pour Eclipse = * Qualinka perspective * Project Explorer specific view * Creational wizards for features, criterions, filters, scenarios and DLGP files. * Run/Debug Qualinka from JSON file ** Link ** Diagnostic ** Complete ** Eval * Run/Debug features, criterions and filters * DLGP Editors ** predicate names autocompletion ** syntax & semantic errors highlight ** display predicate documentation when hovering ** shortcut to open corresponding Java class from predicate (Ctrl+click) ** criterion predicate threshold validation
